game.name: Echoes of the Rest
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A first-person psychological horror game where you explore Joe's house and psyche after his accident, solve clues while trying to escape the house, and attempt to uncover the underlying issue behind Joe's mental state.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A first-person psychological horror game where you explore Joe's house and psyche after his accident, solve clues while trying to escape the house, and attempt to uncover the underlying issue behind Joe's mental state.
